en.contact_thank_you_description: Your message has been received, and I'll be reaching out to you soon. I appreciate your time and look forward to connecting with you!
en.contact_thank_you_reply: The reply will be sent to your email address *{email}*.

in.contact_thank_you_description: Pesan Anda telah kami terima, dan saya akan segera menghubungi Anda. Terima kasih atas waktu Anda, saya menantikan untuk dapat terhubung dengan Anda!
in.contact_thank_you_reply: Balasan akan dikirim ke alamat email *{email}*.

en.title: Or...
en.description: If you prefer, you can reach out to me through the following options:

in.title: Atau...
in.description: Jika berkenan, Anda dapat menghubungi saya melalui pilihan berikut:
